chapter.title: Purifinity's Analysis and Evaluation Architecture
chapter.para: In this chapter an introduction is given on Purifinity's architecture for source code analysis and evaluation. The view on this architecture is from functional point of view which is most interesting for the user of Purifinity. A technical overview is given in a dedicated Administrator's Manual on how to setup and maintain Purifinity on a server.
